entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
